metadata.name: P-Up, D-Down
metadata.description:
• Passive • x2 Damage multiplier • Take double damage • Repentance and multiplayer support
This item doubles your damage, but also makes you take double damage from all sources, turning you into a glass cannon. Will you take the risk?
[u]Item Pools[/u] • Treasure Room
[u]Transformation[/u] • Paper Isaac
This item is also included in the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1826418847]Paper Isaac modpack[/url].
